segments.text: Why did your parents make you stay at home ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They wanted to go out , and so they made me look after my baby brother .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I didn't . My brother was very good and I did quite a lot of homework .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Didn't you even want to go to the cinema ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really . I watched television for an hour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What was on television last night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh . I enjoy watching boxing on television , too.What a pity I missed it last night !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What did you do last night ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I went to a boxing match in the sports stadium .
segments.speaker: S1
